title: mesa fails to build on macOS
body:
`spack install octave+qt` brings in `mesa` which fails to build. I will see if I can make it work with `mesa~swrender+llvm`, it seems [homebrew](https://github.com/Linuxbrew/homebrew-xorg/blob/master/mesa.rb) builds it with `llvm`.

### Expected Result

to have `octave+qt` installed.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install octave+qt
```

### Information on your system

macOS High Sierra 10.13.2.

relevant part of `packages.yaml`:
```
  octave:
    variants: +gnuplot+arpack+suitesparse+qrupdate
```
